explicit

Interface IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IterationMethod.SingleVectorIterationIntervalIter, IterationMethod.TwoVectorIteration
    Enclosing class:
    IterationMethod

    public static interface IterationMethod.IterationIntervalIter
    Interface for an object that provides the atomic steps for a value iteration in the context of interval iteration, i.e., for the interval iteration there are two IterationIntervalIter objects, one from below or from above.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doneWith(IntSet states)
      Notify that the given states are done (e.g., because the given SCC is finished during a topological iteration).

      Perform one iteration (over the set of states)
      void solveSingletonSCC(int s, IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver solver)
      Solve for a given singleton SCC consisting of state using solver, store the result in the solution vector(s).

    • Method Detail

      • init

        Get the current solution vector

        void iterate(IntSet states)
      throws PrismException
        Perform one iteration (over the set of states)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • doneWith

        void doneWith(IntSet states)
        Notify that the given states are done (e.g., because the given SCC is finished during a topological iteration).
        This allows the two-vector iteration methods to store the current values for these states into the second vector, so that switching the vector does not return to previous values.

      • solveSingletonSCC

        void solveSingletonSCC(int s,
                       IterationMethod.SingletonSCCSolver solver)
        Solve for a given singleton SCC consisting of state using solver, store the result in the solution vector(s).

      • getModel

        Model getModel()
        Return the underlying model
